title: Usseewa

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Shut someone up each night, blackmailing them. Then you deal seven Powerful attacks to them.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If someone would attack you, instead, you attack them. Seven times.
- Whenever you kill someone, you copy one of their abilities.
- Anyone who sees this must listen to at least one minute of this song: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Qp3b-RXtz4w

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who would oppose you.

desc:
Post 2180
*I’m limping in a grave but I haven’t quit!*
